system.crew: Pintle-Mounted Storm Bolter (Facing All, Range 90m, Basic, -/-/6, 1d10+5 X, Pen 4, Clip 120, Reload Full, Storm, Tearing)
system.passengers: Tech-Use Tests to repair or restore the vehicle have +20. When receiving Critical Hits not as a result of Righteous Fury, halve the result, rounding up.
